title: Data Engineering
lede: Data Engineering is the foundation of modern analytics—transforming raw data into reliable, tested, documented datasets. dbt has become the lingua franca for data transformation, enabling version control, testing, and documentation as first-class citizens.
stat_label: dev cycle time with prod data in dev (55s vs 15-30m)

terms.name: dbt
terms.definition: Data Build Tool - SQL-first transformation framework with testing and docs

terms.name: Data Mart
terms.definition: Purpose-built dataset optimized for specific analytical use cases

terms.name: Conformed Dimension
terms.definition: Shared dimension used consistently across multiple fact tables

terms.name: Incremental Model
terms.definition: Model that only processes new/changed records, not full refresh

terms.name: ref()
terms.definition: dbt function creating dependencies between models

patterns.name: Staging
patterns.definition: Light transformations on raw source data

patterns.name: Intermediate
patterns.definition: Business logic and joins, not exposed to BI
